item.title: Configuring CloudFront for Static Websites ☁️
item.description: 🔥 read the update wiki on the github wiki section This guide will help you configure CloudFront to serve your static website content with SSL support 🔒. This can be necessary if you need to secure your website with HTTPS. We will cover the following steps: Creating an SSL certificate 📜 Creating a CloudFront distribution 🌏 Updating Route 53 records 🚦 Prerequisites You should have an existing S3 bucket that serves your static website files.
